name: Surviving Foods!
description:
(Best Played in Full Screen)

Game Controls:

A = Left

D  = Right

Space Bar = Jump

Enter/Return = Start Game (shortcut)

R = Restart (shortcut)

Don't Fall into The Temptation of Those Sweet Foods!

I know, I know... Dessert sure does have their own charm. Especially when on empty belly.

 But, Desserts will always be Desserts..they would do nothing good for our body...so instead. Let's try to avoid them! :D

Inspiration:

 On Quarantine days i often found myself walking toward the refrigerator every chance i get.  Rummaging for any desserts or chips i could find...and i do realize that its doing more bad than good.. But, I still find it very challenging to stop...

So instead, Why not make a game about it? ( To  keep myself preoccupied from going back to the fridge again  XD)

Notes:

This game is made for ScoreSpace Game-Jam #8 (Theme:  Balance)(a 3 Days Game Jam)

All Feedbacks are very much appreciated as im still quite new to game development!
